Post.title: curl
Post._content:
## curl  

<!-- more --> 

## -o 
```
curl -o home.html  http://www.baidu.com
```
## -s 
```
curl -s 
```
## -# 

## -O url

```
 curl -# -O  http://www.baidu.com/1.jpg
```
## -x http
```
 curl -x 24.10.28.84:32779 -o home.html http://www.baidu.com
```
## -C()
```
curl -C -O  http://www.baidu.com/1.jpg
```
## cookie
```
curl -b ./cookie.txt  http://www.baidu.com/admin 
```
## cookie
```
curl -c ./cookie_c.txt -F log=aaaa -F pwd=****** http://blog.51yip.com/wp-login.php  
```
## 
```
curl -D ./cookie_c.txt -F log=aaaa -F pwd=****** http://blog.51yip.com/wp-login.php  
```

Post.title: atomic
Post._content:
### go  

<!-- more -->  

atomic goroutine atomic 

- atomic

    -   
        CPUgoroutine
        - func AddInt32(addr *int32, delta int32) (new int32)

        - func AddInt64(addr *int64, delta int64) (new int64)

        - func AddUint32(addr *uint32, delta uint32) (new uint32)

        - func AddUint64(addr *uint64, delta uint64) (new uint64)

        - func AddUintptr(addr *uintptr, delta uintptr) (new uintptr)
        ```
            var m int64=0
            atomic.AddInt32(&m,3)

        ```
    -   

        CPU
        - func LoadInt32(addr *int32) (val int32)

        - func LoadInt64(addr *int64) (val int64)

        - func LoadPointer(addr *unsafe.Pointer) (val unsafe.Pointer)

        - func LoadUint32(addr *uint32) (val uint32)

        - func LoadUint64(addr *uint64) (val uint64)

        - func LoadUintptr(addr *uintptr) (val uintptr)
    -   

        CAS
        - unc SwapInt32(addr *int32, new int32) (old int32)

        - func SwapInt64(addr *int64, new int64) (old int64)

        - func SwapPointer(addr *unsafe.Pointer, new unsafe.Pointer) (old unsafe.Pointer)

        - func SwapUint32(addr *uint32, new uint32) (old uint32)

        - func SwapUint64(addr *uint64, new uint64) (old uint64)

        - func SwapUintptr(addr *uintptr, new uintptr) (old uintptr)
    -  
         old CAS

        goroutine CASfor
        
        ```
        var value int64
        func atomicAddOp(tmp int64) {
            for {
                oldValue := value
                if atomic.CompareAndSwapInt64(&value, oldValue, oldValue+tmp) {
                    return
                }
            }
        }
        ```

        - func CompareAndSwapInt32(addr *int32, old, new int32) (swapped bool)

        - func CompareAndSwapInt64(addr *int64, old, new int64) (swapped bool)

        - func CompareAndSwapPointer(addr *unsafe.Pointer, old, new unsafe.Pointer) (swapped bool)

        - func CompareAndSwapUint32(addr *uint32, old, new uint32) (swapped bool)

        - func CompareAndSwapUint64(addr *uint64, old, new uint64) (swapped bool)

        - func CompareAndSwapUintptr(addr *uintptr, old, new uintptr) (swapped bool)
    -   
        

        - func StoreInt32(addr *int32, val int32)

        - func StoreInt64(addr *int64, val int64)

        - func StorePointer(addr *unsafe.Pointer, val unsafe.Pointer)

        - func StoreUint32(addr *uint32, val uint32)

        - func StoreUint64(addr *uint64, val uint64)

        - func StoreUintptr(addr *uintptr, val uintptr)

Post.title: jq
Post._content:
### jq
    jqjsonsedawkgrep

<!-- more -->  

### "."
    jq"."
    ```
    cat json.text|jq .
    ```
    example
    ```
    {
    "name": "tool",
    "url": "http://tool.china.com",
    "addr": {
        "city": "beijing",
        "country": "china"
    },
    "array": [
        {
        "comp": "google",
        "url": "http://www.google.com"
        },
        {
        "comp": "baidu",
        "url": "http://www.baidu.com"
        }
    ]
    }
    ```
### index
    ```
    cat json.text|jq '.[0]'
    ```
###  |
    ```
    cat json.txt | jq '.[0] | {name:.name,city:.addr.city}'
    ```
    echo:

    {
        "name":"jjj",
        "city":"bj"
    }


    ```
    cat json.txt | jq '.[0] | {name:.array[0].comp,city:.addr.city}'
    ```
    echo:

    {
        "name":"google",
        "city":"bj"
    }
### [] jq

### {} key
    ```
    cat json.txt | jq '.[0] | {username:.array[0].comp,livecity:.addr.city}'
    ```

Post.title: http

(2) webweb  
(3) web  
(4) web

### HTTP2.0HTTP1.X

1.Binary FormatHTTP1.x01HTTP2.0

2.MultiPlexingrequestrequestidrequestrequestrequest idrequest

3.headerHTTP1.xheaderHTTP2.0encoderheadercacheheader fieldsheader

4.server pushSPDYHTTP2.0server push

### http url 

* URL  

    (1)'+'     URL+                  %2B  

    (2)     URL+        %20  

    (3)/                          %2F  

    (4)?        URL               %3F  

    (5)%                             %25  

    (6)'#'                              %23  

    (7)&       URL           %26  

    (8)=       URL                 %3D

Post.title: memcached's note
Post._content:
#### save cmd  

<!-- more -->   

1. set key flags exptime bytes [noreply]  
value  

    
    setkeykey

    [key]: key-value key  
    [flags]:    
    [exptime]:  s    
    [bytes]:   
    [noreply]:   
    [value]: ()  

    ```  
        set runoob 0 900 9
        memcached
        STORED
        get runoob
        VALUE runoob 0 9
        memcached
        END  
    ```
    out info:

    -- STORED
    -- ERROR

2. add key flags exptime bytes [noreply]  
value
 
    
     add  key ( key ) NOT_STORED

    ```
    add new_key 0 900 10
    data_value
    STORED
    get new_key
    VALUE new_key 0 10
    data_value
    END
    ```
    out info;

    -- STORED
    -- NOT_STORED 

3. replace key flags exptime bytes [noreply]  
value

    
     key  NOT_STORED

    ```
    add mykey 0 900 10
    data_value
    STORED
    get mykey
    VALUE mykey 0 10
    data_value
    END
    replace mykey 0 900 16
    some_other_value
    get mykey
    VALUE mykey 0 16
    some_other_value
    END
    ```
    out info:

    -- STORED
    -- NOT_STORED

4. append key flags exptime bytes [noreply]  
value

    
    Memcached append  key()  value()  

    ```
    set runoob 0 900 9
    memcached
    STORED
    get runoob
    VALUE runoob 0 9
    memcached
    END
    append runoob 0 900 5
    redis
    STORED
    get runoob
    VALUE runoob 0 14
    memcachedredis
    END
    ```
    out info:
    -- STORED
    -- NOT_STORED Memcached 
    -- CLIENT_ERROR

5.  prepend key flags exptime bytes [noreply]  
value

    
    
    Memcached prepend  key()  value()  

    ```
    set runoob 0 900 9
    memcached
    STORED
    get runoob
    VALUE runoob 0 9
    memcached
    END
    prepend runoob 0 900 5
    redis
    STORED
    get runoob
    VALUE runoob 0 14
    redismemcached
    END

    ```
    out info:
    -- STORED
    -- NOT_STORED Memcached 
    -- CLIENT_ERROR

6. cas key flags exptime bytes unique_cas_token [noreply] value 

    
    params:
        unique_cas_token gets 64
    out info:
    -- STORED
    -- ERROR
    -- EXISTS
    -- NOT_FOUNDMemcached 


7. get key

     
    
    Memcached get  key()  value()  key 

    key
        get key1 key2 key3    

8.  gets key

    
    (Memcached gets  CAS   value()  key )

    ```
    set runoob 0 900 9
    memcached
    STORED
    gets runoob
    VALUE runoob 0 9 1
    memcached
    END
    ```
     gets  1  key  runoob  CAS     

9. delete key [noreply]  

    
    (key)
    ```
    set runoob 0 900 9
    memcached
    STORED
    get runoob
    VALUE runoob 0 9
    memcached
    END
    delete runoob
    DELETED
    get runoob
    END
    delete runoob
    NOT_FOUND

    ```
    out info:
    -- DELETED
    -- ERROR
    -- NOT_FOUNDkey       

10. incr key increment_value  

    
    key key-value  key
    increment_value 
    ```
    set visitors 0 900 2
    10
    STORED
    get visitors
    VALUE visitors 0 2
    10
    END
    incr visitors 5
    15
    get visitors
    VALUE visitors 0 2
    15
    END
    ```
    ```
    set visitors 0 900 2
    10
    STORED
    get visitors
    VALUE visitors 0 2
    10
    END
    decr visitors 5
    5
    get visitors
    VALUE visitors 0 1
    5
    END
    ```

    out info:
    -- NOT_FOUNDkey 
    -- CLIENT_ERROR
    -- ERROR

Post.title: mdhtml
Post._content:
### md html

<!-- more -->  

```
pandoc -s -S --toc -c github2.css a.md  -o a.html   
```
### math.tex html
 math.tex
    ```
    % Pandoc math demos
    $a^2 + b^2 = c^2$
    $v(t) = v_0 + \frac{1}{2}at^2$
    $\gamma = \frac{1}{\sqrt{1 - v^2/c^2}}$
    $\exists x \forall y (Rxy \equiv Ryx)$
    $p \wedge q \models p$
    $\Box\diamond p\equiv\diamond p$
    $\int_{0}^{1} x dx = \left[ \frac{1}{2}x^2 \right]_{0}^{1} = \frac{1}{2}$
    $e^x = \sum_{n=0}^\infty \frac{x^n}{n!} = \lim_{n\rightarrow\infty} (1+x/n)^n$
    ```
    ```
    pandoc math.tex -s --mathml  -o mathMathML.html
    ```
    
### 
- -s standaloneheaderfooter(standalone HTML, LaTeX, RTF)
- -S 
- --toc 
- data-dir=DIRECTORYpandoc:$HOME/.pandocpandoc --version
- -c URL, css=URLCSS
- -mathml  Pandoc  LaTeX  MathML

```
    CREATE TABLE `user` (
    `user_id` bigint(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '',
    `uuid` bigint(20) DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '',
    `guid` bigint(20) DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'ID',
    `is_certed` tinyint(4) DEFAULT '2' COMMENT '1  2  ',
    `mobile` varchar(40) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin NOT NULL COMMENT '',
    `last_login_tm` datetime(6) DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00.000000' COMMENT '',
    `last_login_device` varchar(20) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '',
    `remark` varchar(250) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin DEFAULT '' COMMENT '',
    `is_deleted` tinyint(4) DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '1 2 ',

    PRIMARY KEY (`user_id`)
    ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=0 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_bin COMMENT='';  
```

Post.title: kafka
Post._content:
## cli of kafka 

<!-- more -->

- start zookeeper
    ```
    zookeeper-server-start /usr/local/etc/kafka/zookeeper.properties 
    ```
- start kafka
    ```
    kafka-server-start /usr/local/etc/kafka/server.properties 
    ```
- create topic
    ```
    cd /usr/local/Cellar/kafka/2.1.0
    ./bin/kafka-topics --create --zookeeper localhost:2181 --replication-factor 1 --partitions 1 --topic test
    ```
- show topics
    ```
    cd /usr/local/Cellar/kafka/2.1.0
    ./bin/kafka-topics --list --zookeeper localhost:2181
    ```
- delete topic
    ```
    cd /usr/local/Cellar/kafka/2.1.0
    ./bin/kafka-run-class kafka.admin.DeleteTopicCommand --topic test --zookeeper127.0.0.1:2181
    ```
- start producer
    ```
    cd /usr/local/Cellar/kafka/2.1.0
    bin/kafka-console-producer --broker-list localhost:9092 --topic test
    ```
- start consumer
    ```
    cd /usr/local/Cellar/kafka/2.1.0
    ./bin/kafka-console-consumer --bootstrap-server localhost:9092 --group cousunmer --topic test --from-beginning
    ``` 
- stop kafka
    ```
    cd /usr/local/Cellar/kafka/2.1.0 
     ./bin/kafka-server-stop
    ```
- 
    - 
        ```
        ./bin/kafka-consumer-groups --bootstrap-server localhost:9092 --list
        ```
    - 
        ```
        /bin/kafka-consumer-groups --bootstrap-server localhost:9092  --describe --group consumer03
        ```
- topic
    - topic
        ```
        ./bin/kafka-topics.sh --zookeeper localhost:2181 --list
        ```
    - topic
        ```
        ./bin/kafka-topics.sh --zookeeper localhost:2181 --describe --topic Hello-Kafka
        ```
    - topic
        ```
        ./bin/kafka-topics.sh --zookeeper localhost2181 --alter --topic Hello-Kafka --partitions 3
        ```
    
## why need kafka?
- 
- 
- 

- 
    - O(1)TB
    - 10
    - 
    - 
    - 
    - producerbrokerpartition,consumerbrokerpartition

## 1:

-  
-  
-   
-    
-   
-

- RabbitMQ erlang AMQPXMPP,SMTP,STOMP, 
    peer-2-peer/
- Redis  redis10kbrabbitmq
- ZeroMQ  peer-2-peer
- ActiveMQ JMS peer-to-peer  XA
- kafka/   
- MetaQ/RocketMQ java /

kafkazookeeperproducerconsumerbrokerzookeepertopicpartitionzookeeperwatcherzookeeper

Producerzookeeper""broker,TopicpartitionleadersocketTopicpartitionLeadBrokerzookeeperbroker,partition leader.Consumerzookeeperconsumer,consumerpartition,broker,partition leadersocket,.


## pull & push

        -

            pushbrokerbrokerconsumerpushconsumer
    - pull(kafka)  
        - :  
            pullconsumer
        - :  
            (kafkalong polling)
            brokerconsumertKafkaconsumer(  
  
## Semantic  

- topic & partition
    topic,topickey

## cli of kafka 

<!-- more -->

- start zookeeper
    ```
    zookeeper-server-start /usr/local/etc/kafka/zookeeper.properties 
    ```
- start kafka
    ```
    kafka-server-start /usr/local/etc/kafka/server.properties 
    ```
- create topic
    ```
    cd /usr/local/Cellar/kafka/2.1.0
    ./bin/kafka-topics --create --zookeeper localhost:2181 --replication-factor 1 --partitions 1 --topic test
    ```
- show topics
    ```
    cd /usr/local/Cellar/kafka/2.1.0
    ./bin/kafka-topics --list --zookeeper localhost:2181
    ```
- delete topic
    ```
    cd /usr/local/Cellar/kafka/2.1.0
    ./bin/kafka-run-class kafka.admin.DeleteTopicCommand --topic test --zookeeper127.0.0.1:2181
    ```
- start producer
    ```
    cd /usr/local/Cellar/kafka/2.1.0
    bin/kafka-console-producer --broker-list localhost:9092 --topic test
    ```
- start consumer
    ```
    cd /usr/local/Cellar/kafka/2.1.0
    ./bin/kafka-console-consumer --bootstrap-server localhost:9092 --group cousunmer --topic test --from-beginning
    ``` 
- stop kafka
    ```
    cd /usr/local/Cellar/kafka/2.1.0 
     ./bin/kafka-server-stop
    ```
- 
    - 
        ```
        ./bin/kafka-consumer-groups --bootstrap-server localhost:9092 --list
        ```
    - 
        ```
        /bin/kafka-consumer-groups --bootstrap-server localhost:9092  --describe --group consumer03
        ```
- topic
    - topic
        ```
        ./bin/kafka-topics.sh --zookeeper localhost:2181 --list
        ```
    - topic
        ```
        ./bin/kafka-topics.sh --zookeeper localhost:2181 --describe --topic Hello-Kafka
        ```
    - topic
        ```
        ./bin/kafka-topics.sh --zookeeper localhost2181 --alter --topic Hello-Kafka --partitions 3
        ```
